name: MusicToLed
description: Music To Led is an open source program that allows you to create real-time audio and midi visualizations on led strips using Arduino, Electron and Python.

scripts.list-available-ports: cd python-app; python3 -m inputs.midiInput --list; python3 -m inputs.audioInput --list; python3 -m outputs.serialOutput --list
scripts.clean-python: cd python-app; rm -Rf build; rm -Rf dist; find . | grep -E "(__pycache__|.pyc|.pyo)"| xargs rm -rf

author: tfrere
